ud8.4:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
ud8.4:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhū nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṃseti.
ud8.4:3.4: Tedha bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
ud8.4:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
ud8.4:5.2: Calite asati passaddhi, passaddhiyā sati nati na hoti.
ud8.4:5.5: Cutūpapāte asati nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena.
